author: Anita Kumar
title: Trump can’t decide whether to blame China for the coronavirus
description: Outside advisers say the tactic is helping counteract Chinese propaganda and creating a 2020 reelection argument. To his critics, it’s merely an attempt to shift blame.
content: Its the latest iteration of a dynamic that has played out over the three years that Trump has managed Americas relationship with China. Armed with the conflicting views of his closest advisers, the president has regularly flip-flopped between lavishing praise… [+5868 chars]
